item.title: Worker health
item.description: Every year in New York City, workers are injured on the job or become ill as a result of exposure to health hazards at work. However, most work-related illnesses and injuries are preventable – safer work environments can be achieved when workplace hazards are understood and appropriate prevention measures are put in place. Data on work-related injuries and illness are used to show how often these preventable events occur and to identify factors that place workers at risk.
